replies.body:
Bugsplats, regardless of where they occur, generally point towards an issue with a specific system driver or hardware problem. A lot of the common fixes for this can be found within our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I'd strongly recommend giving that guide a go.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
